input_text:
Job Title: Regional Property Manager

Location: Columbus, Ohio Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Sales

Description:
OverviewWe are searching for a Regional Manager to join our Property Management team. This position is responsible for directing and overseeing the overall operations of their apartment communities, within an assigned geographical area. The right person will provide exceptional leadership, direction, and support to their team. You will also need to be well versed in sales, marketing, and analytical reporting as a goal is to produce the maximum cash flow and improve the property's long-term value.
Why Rocky Fork?We are a local Columbus, Ohio based vertically integrated real estate company. We pride ourselves on providing a best in class living experience for our tenant and driving superior returns for our investors. At Rocky Fork you will have a hand in every step of the lifecycle of property ownership from acquisition, to lease up, to disposition and everything in between. This role will offer tremendous growth opportunities for the right candidate who is looking to find a home with a long runway to launch their career. 
Role & Responsibilities:
Point person for all leasing activities including inbound inquiries, lead management, appointment scheduling, lease signing and renewalsFirst point of contact for tenantsEnsure property marketing is current, accurate and relevant Direct activities of on-site personnel and ensure resident request are addressed in a timely mannerConduct routine site inspections ensuring great curb appeal across the portfolioMaintain accurate records with Appfolio Property Management softwareDrive profitability by overseeing collection of rent and other income and identifying expense savings opportunitiesAssists with monthly reconciliations and reimbursements for properties and renovation projects Requirements:Strong leadership skills & entrepreneurial mindsetExcellent written & verbal communication skills2+ Years in property management or similar customer-service oriented roleProficiency in Microsoft Office SuiteProficiency in Property Management Software Benefits:Bonus EligibleMedical, dental and vision80 Hours of Paid Time Off6 Paid Holidays plus two floating HolidaysCell Phone reimbursement20% off rent in any of our communities

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Regional Property Manager
output_json.summary: Responsible for directing and overseeing the operations of assigned apartment communities.

First point of contact for tenants
Ensure resident requests are addressed in a timely manner
Maintain accurate records with Appfolio Property Management software
Drive profitability by overseeing collection of rent and expenses
benefits: 6 Paid Holidays plus two floating Holidays
20% off rent in any of our communities
